title: Skrillex Returns To Rock & Metal Music! This Is The Comeback Single [News]
text: + Submit article Skrillex Returns to Rock & Metal Music! This Is the Comeback Single From First to Last unveil "Make War," it remains unclear whether this is a one-off thing or something more. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 15 hours ago 5 Skrillex has officially reunited with his old post-hardcore band From First to Last on their latest single track "Make War." The announcement comes after a series of hints and rumors, including the latest photo of Skrillex and FFTL's Matt Good in the studio with Blink-182 guys. As you may or may not know, Skrillex was a member of the gang between 2004 and 2007. During that period, he sang on two of the band's studio efforts - 2004's "Dear Diary, My Teen Angst Has a Body Count" and 2006's "Heroine." Whether this is a one-off thing or something more remains to be seen. You can check out the latest single below. " frameborder="0">
